title: [Neutral]  eBay can cancel unconfirmed accounts or accounts that have been inactive for a long time.

tosdr.case: [Neutral]  eBay can cancel unconfirmed accounts or accounts that have been inactive for a long time.  -neutral-undefined
tosdr.tldr: They can modify or discontinue their Services and reserve the right to refuse or terminate all or part of their Services to anyone for any reason at their discretion.
